Package server.services

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
server.services.Service
server.services.GameService
public class GameService extends Service
Manages the requests and responses for all the Game endpoints in the server.

    • listGames

      public Collection<GameData> listGames()
      Gets a list of all active games.
      Returns:
      The list of games as a collection of GameData objects.

    • createGame

      public GameData createGame(String gameName)
      Creates a new game, generating a new gameID that will be used by the server.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The user's requested name for the new game.
      Returns:
      The newly created GameData object.

    • joinGame

      public GameData joinGame(String username, ChessGame.TeamColor color, int gameID) throws ServerException
      Verifies that the specified game exists, and, if a color is specified, adds the caller as the requested color to the game. * If no color is specified the user is joined as an observer. This request is idempotent.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player requesting to join.
      color - The requested user color (Optional). Accepted values: WHITE, BLACK, or null.
      gameID - Required to join the game. The unique game id.
      Returns:
      The GameData object.
      Throws:
      ServerException - Throws an error if the gameID is not found or is unknown, if the color requested is already taken, or if something else goes wrong.
